column4: edbian:when i tried to play .wma file they say that  No packages with the requested plugins found
edbian:when i tried to play .wma file they say that  No packages with the requested plugins found
Hello.  :)  before I answer why did you pick me to ask?
No worries!
I was just curious.
Install the package "ubuntu-restricted-extras"
Let me help him first.  Hang on a second.
Hi.
He left so I'm here now :)
Would you like to learn how to install a package via the cli or gui??
System -> Admin -> Synaptic package manager.
This software is a window to the repository database.  It lists every software package.  You can right click on them to install or remove.  Green filled boxes are installed.
Try install the package "ubuntu-restricted-extras" and then try to play the song again.
Let's make sure collabra is right.
Find that package using syanptic.  You can search it using the search tool.  When you find it right click on it and choose install.
I'm very nervous this won't work.
I warn you it may be a bit of a wild goose chase.
Mhmm
See what the others said about the issue?  You probably wanna try those things as well.
Mmmm maybe collabra was right! :(
